overview:
PhD in “Marketing and new technologies” by Vigo University Post-graduated in “Corporate Strategy” by ESIC Madrid Post-graduated in “Emenrging entrepreneurs” by Cambridge University Graduated in Marketing by IPAM (Oporto)

Workerd on AEP (portuguese companies association) as a consultant for the latin america and north american markets.

Was marketing director of Ensigest,SA and Ensigest Brasil.

Co-founder of Edigma in 2000.
